actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-276.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6714, a bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize development assistance programs for fiscal year l978, to amend the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954 to make certain changes in the authorities of that Act.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6714 (Foreign assistance program and agricultural trade assistance authority).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6714, a bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize development assistance programs for fiscal year l978, to amend the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954 to make certain changes in the authorities of that Act.
